item.title: Fun 2 - [Python] Pong in Pygame
item.description: In the second part of the Fun series, we are going to create the classic pong game in Pygame with new concepts such as game loop, boundaries, and collision.

item.title: Fun 1 - [Python] A simple Hangman game
item.description: Post No. 1 of the Fun series, in which I demonstrate quick, fun, little game that you can code in Python with lessons that you can learn from.

item.title: How I created my blog using Hugo
item.description: In the last few years, static site generators have gathered lots of attention with the like of Hugo, Gatsby, and many others. These static site generators are mostly used for informative websites such as blog with features that help user to focus more on writing contents.
